headline.main: British Break Axis Line; AMERICANS GAIN 9 MILES IN SICILY

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Aug. 1 -- The British Eighth Army breached the Axis line southwest of Catania as the Allied line in Sicily rolled inexorably forward, squeezing the Axis forces into the rocky fastnesses of northeastern Sicily.
abstract: Allied planes bomb roads, trucks and barges
snippet: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Aug. 1 -- The British Eighth Army breached the Axis line southwest of Catania as the Allied line in Sicily rolled inexorably forward, squeezing the Axis forces into the rocky fastnesses of northeastern Sicily....
